metadata.synopsis: A goblin guard who reached Moonrise Towers with us. Currently idle as they await their new orders.

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Lora
0.text: No food waiting for us? 'S barbaric. They got plenty of prisoners for the roasting.
0.context: NodeContext: whining - end of a long shift and they haven't been fed

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Lora
1.text: Good luck inside the tower, boss. Better you than me.
1.context: NodeContext: Just a common soldier and aspiring to no more - doesn't envy the circles we swim in
